newsitem.title: USA: Eltrax to buy Westron Communications.
newsitem.headline: Eltrax to buy Westron Communications.

text.p: Eltrax Systems Inc said Tuesday it reached an agreement in principle to acquire Westron Communications Inc of Dallas.
The transaction will be a stock-for-stock merger and is expected to be accounted for as a pooling-of-interests. It is expected to close before June 30. Other financial terms were not disclosed.
Westron markets enterprise network systems and services to customers in Texas, Oklahoma, Arkansas and Louisiana. It 1996 revenues of approximately $5.5 million.
"Westron focuses on the higher margin end-user market where we expect our future growth to be," William O'Reilly, chairman, said in a statement.
Eltrax provides communications products and services for enterprise-wide networks.
